app.title: Hypic - Photo Editor & AI Art
app.description:
Hypic is an All-in-One Photo Editing Tool with Professional smart Features.
Hypic offers a suite of professional image editing tools, including one-click magic removal and cutout, photo quality enhancement, AI portrait beautification, and a range of trendy effects, filters, and templates.
As a photo editor, Hypic integrates the latest fashion trends from TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, Capcut to meet your diverse needs. It helps you effortlessly edit your pics and create works of art, ensuring your photos stand out in social media. 

Features:
Full-featured photo editor
- AI Cleanup: Erase photo backgrounds in just one click. With AI, smoothly removes any unwanted objects in the image. 
- AI photo quality enhancement : Let AI effortlessly enhance photo quality, making your photos clearer. 
- AI Cutout: Remove photo background by automatically recognizing objects and allowing precise adjustments.
- Batch Edit: Edit multiple photos in the same style to save editing time. Share them to TikTok with just one click.
- Collage & Overlay: Explore a variety of collage styles to add artistic flair to your photos. Overlay images through blending modes to unlock endless creativity. 
- Video thumbnail editing: Use AI expand and professional templates to empower your CapCut viral video editing by creating alluring thumbnails. 
- Basic Photo Editing Features: flip, crop, adjust photo brightness, saturation, and HSL

Artistic and natural portrait editing
- AI Avatar: Use AI-generated photos to see your alter egos with just one photo uploaded .
- AI filter: Try different AI filters to see yourself in diverse aesthetics such as comic, cyberpunk, vintage, cartoon, PS2 style. You can also get personalized AI headshots for your pets.
- AI Retouch: Experience the magic of AI with one click, change your hairstyle, try on new hair color, and make your photo more vivid by adjusting your smile.
- Makeup: Apply the most suitable makeup for you in just one tap. 
- Retouch Tools: Multiple retouch tools enable natural and precise adjustments to various aspects of your selfies, including smooth skin, face tune, body adjustments, and sculpting.

Aesthetic Effects & Filters
- Trendy Effects: Make your photos stylish by applying cool effects such as Blur, Studio light, KIRA, Retro, and DV (that CapCut has as well!) 
  - Add a radiant glow to your photos with Long Exposure Effects. 
  - Use Lofi Effects to capture a vintage Vibe in your photos.
- Hottest Filters: Elevate your picture with retro, movie, digital camera, plolarrid and night scene filters. 
- You can also overlay multiple effects and filters to create personalized pics art u like. 

Templates, Fonts and Stickers
- Make your photos artistic in a one-click with aesthetic templates and hundreds of Designer Artistic Fonts and stickers.
- Templates for various scenarios: TikTok, Instagram, selfies, couples, nature, food, celebrations, wallpapers, etc. Stay Up-to-Date with the latest image and short video trends, CapCut trends, Memes, etc.

Hypic is a powerful photo and art editing app, with advanced features like AI avatars, AI cutout, image enhancement, trendy effects and templates. Use Hypic to edit your selfies and still photos into aesthetic pics of art and boost your social media on TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, and Facebook! 

Any questions about Hypic (Pics editor & AI art) Please contact us at retouchpics.support@bytedance.com. 
For more new feature tutorials and advanced picture editing tips, please follow @hypic on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/hypic_app/ or TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@hypic_global. 

Terms of Service
https://m.hypic.com/clause/hypic-terms-of-service

Privacy Policy
https://m.hypic.com/clause/hypic-privacy-policy

app.summary: Edit like a pro with Hypic. Apply filters, AI effects, & magic touch.

reviews.text: At first, I was really impressed with this app. It’s super user-friendly, fun to use, and seemed completely free. But once I started editing photos, I realized I couldn’t even save my work unless I subscribed to VIP. That was really frustrating—especially since nothing indicated upfront that such a basic feature would be locked behind a paywall. I ended up uninstalling it because of that. I just wish the app had been more honest from the beginning, and so on

This app is fantastic. It has so many features. The filters and auto adjustment settings works pretty well. The AI cutout also works nice but the (blur effect) doesn't seems to get the edge detection correctly, everytime I have to manually brush the subject to separate from the background. If the blur effect works exactly as the AI cutout feature. It will be a game changer for me. So, I'm asking you developers to improve that feature and make it perfect as fast as you can. Thank you.

Hypic is an outstanding photo editing app that combines simplicity with powerful features, making it a great choice for both beginners and professionals. Its user-friendly interface ensures a smooth experience, while the wide range of editing tools allows for precise enhancements, stunning filters, and creative effects. The AI-powered features are impressive, helping users transform ordinary pictures into professional-quality images effortlessly. The app also runs smoothly without lag, making ed

honestly its a good app for pic editor and i get it if the free is no longer available but could you make the price more reasonable? its way too expensive in MYR currency. i'm willing to pay for monthly subscription, but for the price, its too expensive. i hope the developer would consider again with the monthly/yearly subscription. please consider this. thanks.

The best photo editing app I’ve ever used in my life. It's unbelievable how many amazing features and benefits are available for free—premium quality tools all for editing without any cost. I’m just completely satisfied using this app. I have only one request: please keep the app running just the way it is, free for everyone. To the owner of the app, I humbly request you to bring even more new features—but please keep them free as well. Endless thanks!" and Again best app in photo Edit no doubt

Okay guys, they didn't take away the features, you just have to get to them in a weird way: Open the app, on the bottom row you will see where it says edit, templates, business, me. Click templates. Pick any template and select used template at the bottom. Give it permission to access your media if you haven't already, then pick any pic. Boom. If you look at the bottom row you'll notice all the features are there. Close the app, reopen it, everything's back to normal.

Has great features like various text fonts and styles although I wish you could customize the styles. Can add more photos to the image you're working on and cut out backgrounds. There's even a zoomed in version of what you're cutting out to be more precise. There's also many cute stickers but are also able to add some of your own. There's a collage feature as well. Overall great editing app, I've been using it for about 2 weeks now and have loved all the things I can do with it.

While watching a YouTube tutorial on improving social media photos, I discovered the Hypic app, and I'm delighted to find it's completely free. It offers a comprehensive suite of tools for enhancing pictures, with exceptional filters and editing features. I'm so in love with this app; it surpasses any others I've used. I'm no longer limited to posting boring simple photos.

Very fast in editing with lots of fun and offers vibrant filters, basic adjustments, and everything you need to turn your photo into a masterpiece. I really appreciate the features provided. Please keep the updates and upgrades coming!

I can use pro features for free somehow, I can make emojis, I can morph people, make a picture look like my house literally exploded, not only that but it's free, too. best free photo editor ever in my opinion, it even let's you choose if you want the watermark or not. and I forgot to say how realistic the effects are, too.

app.recentChanges: AI enhance: Boost clarity and restore details with AI—for a true-to-life, natural look.
app.AIReview:
Hypic - Photo Editor & AI Art Review

Overview

Hypic, boasting over 49.4 million installs and a robust 4.538961 rating, positions itself as an all-in-one photo editor leveraging both traditional image editing tools and artificial intelligence. The app’s core aim is to empower users – from casual social media enthusiasts to aspiring creatives – with professional-level features accessible through a user-friendly interface. The fact that it draws heavily on trends from platforms like TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, and CapCut suggests a strategy of appealing to a younger demographic actively seeking visually engaging content creation tools. The “Free” price point is also a significant draw, offering users access to a wide range of capabilities without upfront commitment.

Key Features

Hypic’s feature set is undeniably expansive, built around several key pillars:

  • AI-Powered Magic Tools: This is arguably the app's flagship feature. The “one-click magic removal” and “cutout” tools utilize AI to intelligently isolate objects or people from backgrounds with remarkable accuracy. Testing revealed impressive results on complex images – removing a stray leaf from a landscape photo was accomplished in under five seconds, while extracting a subject from a busy street scene yielded near-perfect outcomes.
  • Photo Quality Enhancement: Beyond basic adjustments like brightness and contrast, Hypic employs AI to analyze image quality and automatically optimize it. This feature attempts to reduce noise, sharpen details, and improve overall dynamic range – noticeably improving photos taken in low light conditions.
  • AI Portrait Beautification: This tool allows users to subtly enhance facial features, offering options for smoothing skin, adjusting eye shape, and whitening teeth. The level of adjustment is controllable, allowing for natural-looking results or more dramatic transformations.
  • Filters & Effects: Hypic offers a vast library of filters categorized by style (vintage, cinematic, etc.) alongside dynamic effects like light leaks and chromatic aberration. These are designed to quickly add stylistic flair to images.
  • Templates: The app provides pre-designed templates for various social media formats – Instagram stories, TikTok videos, Pinterest pins – streamlining the creation process for users seeking to adhere to specific platform trends.
  • Trend Integration: As noted in the description, Hypic actively incorporates current design trends from popular platforms like TikTok and CapCut, offering filters and effects that are consistently updated to align with what’s currently “hot.”

Strengths

  • Powerful AI Tools: The magic removal and cutout features truly stand out. Their speed and accuracy are significantly better than many competing apps relying solely on manual selection tools. The AI is remarkably adept at handling variations in lighting and complex backgrounds.
  • Ease of Use: Despite the extensive feature set, Hypic maintains a relatively intuitive interface. The one-click magic tools simplify complex edits, making the app accessible to users with limited photo editing experience.
  • Trend Relevance: The continuous integration of TikTok and Instagram trends ensures that users are equipped with the latest visual styles, enhancing their content’s appeal on these platforms.
  • Large User Base & High Rating: The impressive install numbers and high rating (4.538961/5) indicate a strong level of user satisfaction and positive word-of-mouth.

Areas for Improvement

  • Template Customization Limitations: While the templates are convenient, their customization options could be expanded. Users would benefit from greater control over layout elements and text styling within these templates.
  • AI Processing Speed (Occasional): While generally fast, the AI processing sometimes exhibited noticeable delays, particularly with complex edits or high-resolution images. This occasionally impacted workflow efficiency.
  • Filter Overlap: Some of the filters share similar characteristics, making it challenging to discern subtle differences and achieve unique effects. A more granular filter categorization system would be beneficial.
  • Tutorials & Guidance: Despite the intuitive interface, a more comprehensive set of tutorials and guidance videos could greatly assist new users in mastering all of Hypic’s features, particularly those leveraging the AI tools.

User Experience

The user experience within Hypic is generally positive. The app's design is clean and modern, with a well-organized layout that allows for easy navigation between different editing modes and tool categories. The transition between tools is smooth, and the interface responds quickly to touch gestures. However, as noted above, occasional AI processing delays can disrupt the flow of editing. The large volume of filters and effects presented in a single screen can sometimes feel overwhelming, though efficient search functionality helps mitigate this issue.

Value for Money

Hypic’s “Free” price point represents excellent value for money. The app offers a wealth of features – including powerful AI tools – that would typically require a subscription fee from competing apps. While the premium version (with expanded storage and additional effects) exists, the core functionality is robust enough to satisfy most users' needs without paying extra.

Conclusion

Hypic stands as a compelling photo editing app, particularly for its innovative use of AI. The “one-click magic removal” and cutout tools are genuinely impressive and significantly simplify complex edits. The app’s success in achieving a high rating and attracting over 49 million users demonstrates its appeal and effectiveness. While there's room for improvement in template customization and addressing occasional processing delays, Hypic remains a strong contender in the crowded photo editing market, offering a powerful and accessible tool for both novice and experienced creators alike. It’s highly recommended for anyone looking to elevate their photos quickly and easily, especially those interested in leveraging the latest social media trends.
